company.name: Shreyas Media
company.one_liner: Shreyas Media delivers movie events, promotions, advertising and digital campaigns, operating from Hyderabad with pan-India and international presence.
company.overview: Shreyas Media is a movie events and promotional company headquartered in Hyderabad that has executed thousands of events and movie promotions. They offer film promotions, event management, digital campaigns, advertising solutions and ticketed event operations.
company.headquarters: Madhuw Vihar, 5th Floor, Jubilee Hills Road No.7, Hyderabad, Telangana, India - 500033

faq.a: Shreyas Media organizes movie promotions, star events, premieres, branded events and digital marketing campaigns for films and entertainment brands.

faq.q: How many events and promotions have you done?
faq.a: Public materials and the company site state the organization has executed thousands of events and over a thousand movie promotions across several years.

faq.q: Where are you located and which cities do you serve?
faq.a: Headquartered in Hyderabad with presence/operations across Indian cities and international offices mentioned on the company site.

faq.q: Do you handle advertising for large public events?
faq.a: Yes. The company has publicly announced large advertising partnerships, for example exclusive advertising rights for Maha Kumbh Mela 2025.
No public detailed pricing for services is listed. For pricing and packages, the company asks prospective clients to contact the business team for custom quotes.

faq.q: How can I contact you for business enquiries?
faq.a: Business enquiries can be sent to biz@shreyasgroup.net or by calling +91 9666 02 6666. The office address is listed on the website.

pricing.note: No public fixed service pricing is listed on the official site. Contact biz@shreyasgroup.net for tailored quotes. Ticket prices for consumer events (when applicable) vary per event and are listed on product/event pages.
